import React, { useContext, useEffect, useState } from 'react' import Texts from '../Texts'; import { Context } from '../Context'; import IndividualMembershopApprovalPDF from '../files/IndividualMembershipApproval.pdf' import EntitiesMembershopApprovalPDF from '../files/EntitiesMembershipApproval.pdf' import accountPDF from '../files/account.pdf' export default function AssociationRegister() { const { lang } = useContext(Context); const texts = Texts[lang]; const [memberShip, setMemberShip] = useState('single'); const [Endorsement, setEndorsement] = useState([]); const [IdentityImg, setIdentityImg] = useState([]); const [NationalAddressImg, setNationalAddressImg] = useState([]); const [TransferImg, setTransferImg] = useState([]); const [individual, setIndividual] = useState({ name: 'a', age: 'a', nationality: 'a', identityNo: 'a', identitySource: 'a', identityDate: 'a', birthPlace: 'a', birthDate: 'a', residence: 'a', occupation: 'a', phone: 'a', tel: 'a', email: 'a', Postalbox: 'a', Postalcode: 'a', qualification: 'a', specialization: 'a', role: 'a', reason: 'a', }) useEffect(()=>{ console.log(Endorsement) },[Endorsement]) async function submit() { let name = individual.name; let age = individual.age; let nationality = individual.nationality; let identityNo = individual.identityNo; let identitySource = individual.identitySource; let identityDate = individual.identityDate; let birthPlace = individual.birthPlace; let birthDate = individual.birthDate; let residence = individual.residence; let occupation = individual.occupation; let phone = individual.phone; let tel = individual.tel; let email = individual.email; let Postalbox = individual.Postalbox; let Postalcode = individual.Postalcode; let qualification = individual.qualification; let specialization = individual.specialization; let role = individual.role; let reason = individual.reason; let endorsement = Endorsement.image; let identityImg = IdentityImg.image; let transferImg = TransferImg.image; let nationalAddressImg = NationalAddressImg.image; let items = { name, age, nationality, identityNo, identitySource, identityDate, birthPlace, birthDate, residence, occupation, phone, tel, email, Postalbox, Postalcode, qualification, specialization, role, reason, endorsement, identityImg, nationalAddressImg, transferImg, }; let result = await fetch("http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/individual-register", { method: 'POST', body: JSON.stringify(items), headers: { "Content-Type": 'application/json', "Accept": 'application/json' } }) result = await result.json() } return ( <>
